member.summary: Generates syntax tree to add custom attributes to the in-memory assembly Need to use this for adding the UserSecrets attribute to the assembly.

member.summary: Generates a syntax tree with the custom attribute for User Secrets.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.CodeModelMetadata
member.summary: CodeModelMetadata is used to expose properties of a model without Entity type information

member.summary: Always return empty array as there is no Entity type information

member.summary: Returns an array of properties that are bindable. (For eg. primitive types, strings, DateTime etc.)

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingResult
member.summary: Represents the result of obtaining EF metadata for a context and a model type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingResult.ContextProcessingStatus
member.summary: An enumeration representing what kind of processing was done for the given context name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingResult.ModelMetadata
member.summary: EF metadata to be used for generating views / controller code.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingStatus
member.summary: Represents the status of EF DbContext processing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingStatus.ContextAvailable
member.summary: No edits were required to DbContext

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingStatus.ContextAdded
member.summary: A new context was created and succefully configured through DI.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingStatus.ContextAddedButRequiresConfig
member.summary: A new context was created however requires some more configuration changes for DI to work.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ContextProcessingStatus.ContextEdited
member.summary: A context was available but it was edited to add DbSet property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.EntityFrameworkServices.PersistSyntaxTree(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SyntaxTree)
member.summary: Writes the DbContext to disk using the given Roslyn SyntaxTree. The method expects that SyntaxTree has a file path associated with it. Handles both writing a new file and editing an existing file.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.IEntityFrameworkService.GetModelMetadata(System.String,Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.ModelType,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the EF metadata for given context and model. Method takes in full type name of context and if there is no context with that name, attempts to create one. When creating a context, the method also tries to modify Startup code to register the new context through DI. When the given context is available but there is no DbSet property of given model type context will be edited to add the property. The method throws exceptions if there are any errors running EF code to get the EF metadata. And no changes are written to disk. When the method successfully returned, it's guranteed to have ModelMetadata present in the return value. Before returning all the code edits are persisted to disk.
member.param: Full name (including namespace) of the context class.
Model type for which the EF metadata has to be returned.
Name of the area on which scaffolding is being run. Used for generating path for new DbContext.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.IEntityFrameworkService.GetModelMetadata(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.ModelType)
member.summary: Gets the metadata for a given model without using the Datacontext. Without the datacontext, the metadata will consist of no Navigations/ Primary keys.
member.param: Model type for the EF metadata has to be returned.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.DbContextCreationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error creating a DbContext :{0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.DbContextCreationError_fileExists
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error creating a DbContext, the file {0} already exists.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.DbContextCreationError_noTypeReturned
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error creating/modifying a DbContext, there was no type returned after compiling the new assembly successfully.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.DbContextTypeNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not get the reflection type for DbContext : {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.EnsureStartupClassExists
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Make sure there is a Startup class and a ConfigureServices method and Configuration property in it..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.FailedToEditStartup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scaffolding failed to edit Startup class to register the new Context using Dependency Injection..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.ModelTypeCouldNotBeAdded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not add Model type '{0}' to DbContext '{1}'. Please make sure that '{1}' has a DbSet property for '{0}'..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.ModelTypeNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not get the reflection type for Model : {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.NoEntityOfTypeInDbContext
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no entity type {0} on DbContext {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.ScaffoldingNeedsToRerun
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Scaffolding should be run again since it needs to reload the application with the added package reference - just run the previous command one more time..

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.TemplateProcessingError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There was an error running the template {0}: {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.MessageStrings.TypeCastToDbContextFailed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Instance of type {0} could not be cast to DbContext.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelMetadata.GetSortedProperties(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType)
member.summary: Sort properties according to reflection order.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.ModelMetadata.Navigations
member.summary: Only navigations that are dependent and has all properties defined in code (non-shadow properties) are returned as part of this. Typically this is used to create code for drop down lists to choose values from principal entity.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.PropertyMetadata.#ctor(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Use this constructor when the model is being used without datacontext. It will set the property as: Non primary Non foreign key. Non autogenerated Writable Non Enum type

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.RoslynCodeEditUtilities.AddUsingDirectiveIfNeeded(System.String,Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.CompilationUnitSyntax)
member.summary:
Adds a using directive if one doesn't already exist at the top of file after existing using directives.
Does not handle the scenarios where usings are defined within an inner node of given root node, ex, if the root node is CompilationUnit and usings are defined within a Namespace Declaration instead of top of the file, the new using is just added at the top of the file.
member.param: Parent syntax node for which the childs are examined to see if a using with the given namespace already exists
member.returns: A new syntax node containing the new using statement as an immediate child of given rootNode. If the using statement is already present, the rootNode is returned. Otherwise, a new statement is added at the end of existing usings and the new node is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.EntityFrameworkCore.TypeUtil.GetShortTypeName(System.Type)
member.summary: An approach to get meaninful short type names for a given type in C#. Handles most known cases, refer to tests in TypeUtilTests.cs Other potential approach is to use CodeDom (CodeTypeReference) with the help of RegEx however CodeDom is not available in CoreClr and hence I chose this approach. Of course the method only works for C# language.
